mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_member(id, pw, name, phone1, phone2, phone3, email, zipcode, addr1, addr2, birth_year, birth_month, birth_day) VALUES(#{id}, #{pw}, #{name}, #{phone1}, #{phone2}, #{phone3}, #{email}, #{zipcode}, #{addr1}, #{addr2}, #{birth_year}, #{birth_month}, #{birth_day})
mapper.update: UPDATE tbl_member SET name = #{name}, phone1 = #{phone1}, phone2 = #{phone2}, phone3 = #{phone3}, email = #{email}, zipcode = #{zipcode}, addr1 = #{addr1}, addr2 = #{addr2}, birth_year = #{birth_year}, birth_month = #{birth_month}, birth_day = #{birth_day} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT name FROM tbl_member WHERE id=#{id} AND PW=#{pw}
